DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety efficacy AGN-229666 treatment seasonal perennial allergic conjunctivitis .
DOC.brief_title: AGN-229666 Ophthalmic Solution Treatment Seasonal Perennial Allergic Conjunctivitis
DOC.criteria: Japanese patient live Japan allergic conjunctivitis itch redness Able willing discontinue wear contact lens study period . Eye surgical intervention and/or history refractive surgery within 6 month History retinal detachment , diabetic retinopathy , progressive retinal disease Presence active eye infection ( bacterial , viral , fungal ) History eye herpetic infection Use corticosteroid within 6 month anticipate use study .
